title: S_A_A_S__L_A_B_S | SDE-2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech 2021, Tier 3
Years of Experience: 2.5
Prior Experience:  Startup
Current Comp: 13 LPA (all fixed)
Date of the Offer: Nov, 23
Company:S_A_A_S__L_A_B_S 
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 19 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: 2 LPA (variable)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 21 LPA
Benefits: Standard (insurance, gratuity, snacks, lunch etc)
Other details: Confused whether to take this offer or not. Not having any other offer as of now to negotiate. My current org has been giving 40%+ hike every year and I expect the same in March 2024 as well. So my base will more or less become same in a few months. The new HR says they might consider me in their appraisals that are due in June 24. Current org is 5 days a week with 1 day wfh, new org 5 days a week with 2 days wfh. I am also planning to start preparing for GMAT asap and I'd need some study time every single day in order to prepare well. And 2 hours of classes MWF late at night. Switch or no?

title: Loop Health | Software Engineer | November, 2023 | Bangalore
content:
Education: BTech in CS, 2022
Years of Experience: 1 year 8 months FTE
Prior Experience: Mid sized product based company + multiple internships
Date of the Offer: Nov, 2023
Company: Loop Health
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Prev Compensation: ~ 13.5 (includes pf and gratuity)
Salary: Rs. 22,00,000
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: 0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 22,00,000 (Includes PF and Gratuity)
Benefits: Insurance, 25-30 paid leaves, Remote work, etc.
Other details: Negotiated once. 

It's a fullstack role. The work involves building applications from scratch, mostly in Python and React.js. However existing infra of the company is in Node, React and Python.

Company approach to insurance seems interesting and their funding is good too. Headquarter is Pune, however team is spread across multiple locations and most people work remotely.

Please share your views on company or the role.
